 Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: evp - the clear



  Yes they call it "the foun=
tain" I call it "the fishtank" =3D)

  It's a large tank pumping water thru=
 a charcoal filter (a bit like charli's coffee pot did). I then save the re=
cording, put it thru the p1 filter, and listen then slow to -74% and listen=
. Thats the speed for most messages...forward and reverse. -30% also gets r=
esults sometimes depending on how many come thru.

  Misty

  Staten Island=
 Paranormal <SIParanormalSociety@...> wrote:
    I definitely hear the =
first one clearly. The second one starts out 
    very clear, but I can't m=
ake out the end. I couldn't make out the 
    last one at all!

    When yo=
u say you use water, do you mean you run water while doing 
    EVP? 

    =
Amy
    SI Paranormal

    --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC%40=
yahoogroups.com>, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
    >
    > Did a ses=
sion today using only water and had some good results 
    which I will be =
posting as attachments to this email.
    >

ear for me how about you?
    > Misty
